marklogic.body: Hi Fleur, I have just come across your blog and can't believe you are giving away the Bioderma Crealine H2O Micellar, fantastic. I must admit I am totally addicted to watching Pixiwoos makeup tutorials on You Tube and of corse your good friend Tanya Burr. This is how I got to hear about this product. Sam Chapman from Pixiwoo raves about this and her skin looks amazing so I would love to try it. She Always comments that she has very Dry skin and so do I so if this works for her then I hope it would do the same for me. My favourite skin care product at the moment is the Embryolisse Lait-Creme Concentre (also another Pixiwoo fav) it really hydrates and smooths Dry skin! Lots of love Becca King xxxx
